realtimeProtocol.title: Realtime Protocol
realtimeProtocol.description:
The protocol for realtime collaboration:
- none: no collaboration
- automerge: initial support - EXPERIMENTAL
- yjs: work in progress (planned soon) - EXPERIMENTAL

maxChangesPerDocument.title: Maximum number of changes per document
maxChangesPerDocument.description: The maximum number of changes per document, only appliacable for automerge or yjs realtime protocol - EXPERIMENTAL.

compressionInterval.title: Compression Interval
compressionInterval.description: Number of changes after which the document will be compressed.
